original: intros m x y i Hinv. unfold expf. unfold betweenf. intros Hbetween. split. - simpl in Hinv. destruct Hinv as [Hinv _]. auto. - unfold MF.expo. simpl in *. exists i. split. + reflexivity. + fold (cF m) in *. generalize dependent (Iter (cF m) i (cF m y)). intros z_. induction z_ using nat_ind with (P := fun z_ => MF.f (L m zero x y) z_ = MF.f m z_). * rewrite MF.Iter_upb_period with (z := (cF m y)) in IHz_. rewrite <- IHz_. reflexivity. auto. simpl. unfold MF.exd. trivial. * rewrite MF.Iter_upb_period with (z := (cF m y)) in IHz_. rewrite <- IHz_. reflexivity. auto. simpl. unfold MF.exd. trivial.
